channel.title: How fast you level up
channel.description: how can i change how fast i level up i have a pk server but i dont like how fast i level up and also how can i create a command timer?

item.title: How fast you level up
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

[/quote][quote=“Darkning, post:4, topic:263233”]mining: find the cases for mining and the mining[2] = 200
the mining[2] is the exp so
if the rock id is 1111 it will look something liike:

case 1111:
mining[1] = 1;
mining[2] = 1000;
break;

there is more mining[] but ii cant remember them all, im on vacation, usng a bad comp and very tiired lol hope that helps

woodcuttng is the same thing and for fletching fiind each log id and find the usewith kniife id and underneath that statement you should see addSkillXP(exp, skillnumber)[/quote]

use the search bar for once

Read full topic

item.description:
@WhipDrag wrote:

Go to your Client class(client.java). Search

exprae

Then Change it.

item.title: How fast you level up
item.dc:creator: @Old_Dutch Old~Dutch
item.description:
@Old_Dutch wrote:

Check the tutorial section located in Runescape 2 Server Emulation should have a guide onit.

Also i no that too change the XPrate you have to go into Client.Java and edit the rate in that file.
Sorry for not much help tho Tutorial section will help alot…
